MICRO
m00 0000000000011100001100000001000111010111//Bootstrap
m01 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m02 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//LDA#K
m03 0000000000011100001100000010000110011101
m04 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m05 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m06 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//LDX#K
m07 0000000000011100001100000100000110011101
m08 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m09 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m0a 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//LDA($K)
m0b 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101
m0c 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101
m0d 0000000000011100001100000010000110011101
m0e 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m0f 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m10 0000000000010000000101000000000011011111//LDAX
m11 0000000000011100001100000010000110011101
m12 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m13 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m14 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//LDA$K,X
m15 0000000000010100000101000000000011011101
m16 0000000000011100001100000010000110011101
m17 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m18 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m19 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//LDA($K,X)
m1a 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101
m1b 0000000000010100000101000000000011011101
m1c 0000000000011100001100000010000110011101
m1d 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m1e 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
m1f 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//STA$K
m20 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101
m21 0000000000010000000100100000000000011111
m22 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110
m23 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000
MAPPER
m00 02//LDA#K
m01 06//LDX#K
m02 0a//LDA($K)
m03 10//LDAX
m04 14//LDA$K,X
m05 19//LDA($K,X)
m06 1f//STA$K
MAIN
m00 00//opcodeLDA#K
m01 01//operandLDA#K
m02 06//opcodeSTA$K
m03 20//operandSTA$K
m04 01//opcodeLDX#K
m05 02//operandLDX#K
m06 02//opcodeLDA($K)
m07 15//operandLDA($K)
m08 06//opcodeSTA$K
m09 21//operandSTA$K
m0a 03//opcodeLDAX
m0b 06//opcodeSTA$K
m0c 22//operandSTA$K
m0d 04//opcodeLDA$K,X
m0e 05//operandLDA$K,X
m0f 06//opcodeSTA$K
m10 23//operandSTA$K
m11 05//opcodeLDA($K,X)
m12 16//operandLDA($K,X)
m13 06//opcodeSTA$K
m14 24//operandSTA$K
m15 01//dataarea
m16 02
